posts.post_content:

Brown Chicago HOF EPDG Good - $175

Hartsel Cycle 350 Poor+ - $SOLD

Lipe Hindu PSA 1 (MK) - $SOLD
Lord American Beauty w/Frame Poor - $SOLD
Seitz SL Piedmont 350 EX appeal (paper loss on front) - $55
Strang Sovereign 350 Fair - $SOLD

Hey Tom,
     email sent...


    Be well Brian

posts.post_title: Please feel free to make an offer
